title: 自定义NPC崩溃
txt_content:
[21:40:26] [Server thread/WARN] []: [21:40:26][FINE/CustomNPCs][noppes.npcs.LogWriter:71] Wed Oct 02 21:40:26 CST 2019

[21:40:26] [Server thread/WARN] []: [21:40:26][FINE/CustomNPCs][noppes.npcs.controllers.ScriptController:66] Script Engines Available:

复制代码核心：CatServer 版本:1.12.2 有没有大佬能解决的呀~

replies.author: Jovel
replies.txt_content: Froge版本和模组版本不兼容 更新一下Forge或者用低版本的模组即可
